Topic.Title: Institutionz that hold the bulk of pig tok float dont have to sell it

Message.Msg: Sybil, last weeks run was artificially manufactured by the MM's to unload 1.5M shares on the new Cloud Index fund ETF. The MM did their best to get the maximum price for their shares. Now there is no support or demand for AMZN shares at these prices. The share price is going back to $280's until the earnings report comes out and might go much lower if AMZN disappoints again. The weekly option volume is way down and this fall in share price has nothing to do with Shorts (just check out the latest short interest and open interest in the weekly and monthly PUTS).

I wanted to remind them that this board is a bunch of anonymous people with an interest in the AMZN equity. They will say anything in hopes of either influencing people to react, or use this board as a place to justify their position. Topic.Title: In simple terms QE means Federal Reserve keeps giving money to Amazon.

Message.Msg: Almost accurate.... Qe iz not giving the money directly to amzn the company, rather qe iz going to 'banks' who in turn give it to amzn the bitcoin stok ticker. Qe freesup bank bonds by turning those bonds into cash, they them take this cash and buy and hold worthless bitcoin stok tickers. The too big to save banks then sell optionz premiumz againstvthe bitcoin tickerz and murder crack head option buyerz . The banks allow a miniscule amount of the ticker to free float with which band waggon shorts focused on 'fundementals' shoot each other with again and again with ever higher short covering pricez.... In theory amazon the company doesnt even need to exist - all that iz required iz amzn the ticker for this to work. Its really fairly simple actually.
